PWriterProxy.name: VTKHDFWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a dataset in VTKHDF format.
Documentation.long_help: Write files stored in VTKHDF format.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: The VTKHDF Writer writer writes files in VTKHDF format, using extension .vtkhdf, a format derived from HDF5. Currently, it supports writing Unstructured Grid and PolyData datasets, possibly transient, as well as composite types Partitioned Dataset Collection and Multiblock Dataset, without transient support.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteAllTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When WriteAllTimeSteps is turned ON, the writer writes every available timestep to file. Otherwise, only the current timestep is written.

IntVectorProperty.name: ChunkSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Chunk Size controls the size of HDF5 datasets chunks, only used for transient data. Chunk size can impact multi-process reading performance.

DataExtractWriterProxy.name: VTKHDF
DataExtractWriterProxy.Documentation: Extract writer to write data using the VTKHDF file format (.vtkhdf)
